title: Separation Refines a Man! Sanji and Chopper
short_summary: Sanji's and Chopper's flashbacks on when they were children and when they first met and joined Luffy's crew are shown.
long_summary: The three biggest mafia leaders, Don Luffione, Don Zoroscia, and Don Sanjino meet to discuss issues, and after an argument Don Zoroscia declares war! The assassins Usotuya, Choparini, Namimore, and Robita are then dispatched by the mafia heads to take down one another, with deadly results for all! (Guess who's on top!)
